module.name: Core
module.changelog: *2.3.0beta1.3* #1633 proper display after deleting, #1747 add South Africa to indications.conf, #2024 can't edit exten with directdid set *2.3.0beta1.2* Changed CW default to on, changed freePBX to FreePBX *2.3.0beta1.1* Change core destinations to from-did-direct from ext-local so that findmefollow is used if present *2.3.0beta1.0* First release online upradeable core module *1.2* Core modules code when part of framework
